item.title: Open Data: Berlin Kitas
item.description: In this notebook I want to explore some data I found on the Berlin Open Data portal daten.berlin.de. The data source contains information of Kitas (Kindertagesstätte, i.e. kindergartens) in Berlin. This is a big topic as finding a spot in a Kita is extremely difficult. We first provide an initial exploratory data analysis of the data set, then we merge it with population data to create some geo-location maps. In our way we do not expect to answer on how to find a Kita, but rather simpler questions about their location distribution and sizes.
